A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Simply put\, it's a perfect blend of the standard Star Wars fare but with added humour\, new characters and plenty of action. Without adding spoilers\, if Star Wars ended here it would be perfect climax to the whole saga. Sadly it'll probably get drawn out into a Rocky episode 317 type scenario and lose its punch... Too much of a cash cow still to end it!\n\nBut keeping things to the film in question....amazing....miss it at your peril! ??
